WRITING.TITLE: What was your most pointless college assignment?
I need to prove myself constantly
WRITING.TEXT: My parents are needless to say bipolar. My father will get pissy if I want to do things as a family or ask for a sandwich if he's at a store. If I ask he will go into a tirade about how I'm a failure and need to prove myself and have no money. I have money, I work hard, I am ambitious and never give up. Yet it's never enough. Nothing is ever enough. I seriously want to quit and be a hermit but then I'd feel bad for quitting.
You like video games? Me too! I sadly am a guy And if you don't want to talk I respect your decision. I'm a 21 year old nursing student who also has depression.
I have class for an hour then goinggggggg

WRITING.TITLE: My fathers weird obsession with my hair?
WRITING.TEXT: My father continues his obsession with my hair and how it's a failure with this lovely comment as I walked in the house after it'd been raining. "Your hair looks shitty and crinkly you need to cut it you look like an animal" When in reality? I cut it last week. My campus is big and I had to walk across which caused my hair to be wet. He constantly makes it out to be like he's perfect and with my hair being like it is I'm a failure and look like shit. Everybody has to be exactly like him and if they're not then they're wrong and they suck.
